snippet.title: Super Sol Standard - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Super Sol Standard on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1756730/Super_Sol_Standard/

Muster your army and take on a variety of enemies in this turn-based tactics game. Draft units and use unique skills and terrain to wage war alone, together with your friends, or against them in PvE and PvP modes across a variety of objective types. Raise your battle standard and seize the day! 

#indiegame #games #trailer #tacticsgame #turnbased #turnbasedtactics #turnbasedgame #pixelart #competitive #cooperativegames #coopgaming #coopgames #supersolstandard #solstandard
